name: AVCompositionTrack
desc: A track in a composition that presents media of a uniform type.

items.name: var segments: [AVCompositionTrackSegment]
items.desc: The segments a composition track contains.

items.name: func segment(forTrackTime: CMTime) -> AVCompositionTrackSegment?
items.desc: Returns a segment whose target time range contains, or is closest to, the specified track time.

items.name: class AVCompositionTrackFormatDescriptionReplacement
items.desc: An object that represents a format description and its replacement.
